attributes.action: Stop social media from encouraging terrorism.
attributes.background: The March 2017 London terrorist attack highlighted the role of social media in publishing material showing how to facilitate terrorist atrocities. The UK Government must legislate to force the likes of Google, Facebook and Twitter to do something about this!

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
